General.Name: Norrland Gold Corp
General.Description: Norrland Gold Corp., a precious metals exploration company, focuses on the exploration of gold ores in Sweden. The company owns 100% interest in the Vittanträsket tenement covering an area of approximately 3,741 hectares located in the county of Vasterbotten. It also holds interest in the Pingisvaara tenement covering an area of approximately 900 hectares located in Kiruna Municipality, Northern Sweden; and the Liljendal Rare Earth Elements tenement covering an area of approximately 1,732 hectares located in Central Sweden. The company was formerly known as Horizon Gold Ltd. and changed its name to Norrland Gold Corp. Norrland Gold Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Royal Centre, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3P3
